amendment.description: Amendment ensures that federal agencies supporting cybersecurity efforts of private sector entities remain current on innovation, industry adoption of new technologies and industry best practices as they relate to industrial control systems.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 114-88 to ensure that federal agencies supporting cybersecurity efforts of private sector entities remain current on innovation; industry adoption of new technologies; and industry best practices as they relate to industrial control systems.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A004) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
